DOC.brief_summary: The investigators compare two techniques for laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy. in the first one the distal margin of stapling is 2 cm from the pylorus and in the second it is 6 cm away from the pylorus.
DOC.brief_title: Two or Five cm From Pylorus During Laparoscopic Sleeve Gastrectomy
DOC.criteria: morbid obese patients contraindication to laparoscopy
